title: Unable to connect/reconnect
body:
Currently unable to connect or reconnect to games. I have tried on multiple accounts and multiple game modes. Lobby launches, I select a champ, lobby counts down, i never see the loading screen, mash reconnect button, nothing happens.

Any one else having the same problem?

reloging has no effect, hex tech repair tool no effect, firewall disabled no effect... ideas?

replies.body: It sounds like your network just isn't able to get a clear signal to the game servers at all. First things first, let's make a couple adjustments to your network settings to see if we can get your network a smoother path to our servers. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on Port Forwarding and DNS settings and test those changes in a custom game first. Let me know if that doesn't help so we can do a little more digging!

I am having this problem as well. Earlier today i could get into games but would disconnect every 20 secs for seemingly no reason. Now i tried again and can't connect at all. Reconnect button does nothing.
I have the same issue I cant play either
I haven't had it this bad, but my ping has been spiking a lot, don't know if it's related.
